title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Accompanying others on a meaningful mission or happy quest is a perfect use of your time today. Perhaps fundraising for a worthy cause or shopping for dinner with friends at a farmers market fits the bill. Spending time with cheerful companions is its own reward and you dont need to seek far and wide to do it. Your emotional support and positive attitude make you a sought-after ally for many adventures. Theologian Henri Nouwen wrote, Trust that the treasure we look for is hidden in the ground on which we stand. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
